data.title: Amazon rolls out 'Amazon Pharmacy' branding to PillPack
data.text: Amazon is adding "Amazon Pharmacy" branding to PillPack, the mail-order pharmacy it acquired in 2018.

data.title: JEDI Mind Tricks: Esper Says Cloud Computing Contract Fair As Politics Cloud Efforts To Evaluate Amazon, Microsoft
data.text: The head of the Defense Department on Friday said there was no bias in the agency’s awarding of an enormous $10 billion cloud computing contract known as JEDI to Microsoft Corporation (NASDAQ: MSFT).

data.title: Amazon adds new 'Amazon Pharmacy' branding to PillPack and promotes its CEO
data.text: Amazon is slowly merging the mail-order pharmacy it acquired last year into the fold.

data.title: Great Quarter, Guys: Amazon Vs. Nike (Podcast)
data.text: On this third episode of Great Quarter, Guys, Seth Holm, Kevin Hill and Andrew Cox break down the state of freight from a research based, data-driven approach.

data.title: Medill News Service: Tech giants Google, Amazon and Facebook accused of posing threat to small business
data.text: Tech giants Amazon, Google and Facebook are facing increasing scrutiny from Congress over their online dominance and potential to threaten the thousands of small businesses that compete with them.

data.title: Factbox: How social media sites handle political ads
data.text: Online platforms including Facebook  and Alphabet Inc's   Google face growing pressure to stop carrying political ads that contain false or misleading claims ahead of the U.S. presidential election.

data.title: Bezos claims Microsoft's $10 billion Pentagon win due to Trump feud
data.text: FOX Business' Jackie DeAngelis reports on Amazon's feud against the Pentagon cloud-computing contract.

data.title: Trump Vs. Bezos: Amazon Challenges Pentagon Contract Amid Ongoing Feud
data.text: The feud between Trump and Bezos has lasted for several years.

data.title: Has Amazon Been Trying To Charm Conscious Shoppers In The UK In Advance Of Christmas?
data.text: Over the last couple of months, Amazon has been running TV adverts promoting the fact that the public can book a tour at one of eight of their fulfillment centers in the UK. Are they on a charm offensive?

data.title: Amazon sends out clothing and toy catalogs ahead of the holiday season
data.text: Amazon mailed out its 2019 gift catalog titled "Holiday Together," in early November. The company also dropped its second annual toy catalog across the U.S. Amazon shipped its first-ever printed holiday toy catalog in November 2018. The print catalog represents the e-commerce giant's latest effort to expand into brick-and-mortar retailers.

data.title: Amazon's Dispute With LTL Carrier Heading Back To Court
data.text:
A federal judge ordered a new trial in a lawsuit that pit a less-than-truckload (LTL) carrier against Amazon.com, Inc. 
AMZN 0.49%
, siding with the e-commerce giant's argument about flawed procedures in the first trial.

data.title: Why Amazon's protesting the military cloud contract that went to Microsoft
data.text: Amazon is challenging the Defense Department over a major contract that went to Microsoft.

data.title: Here are the details of Amazon's Defense Department challenge
data.text: Amazon is challenging the Defense Department over a major contract that went to Microsoft. Ed Lee, corporate media reporter for the New York Times, joins "Squawk Box" to discuss.

data.title: Amazon Protests Trump’s Role in $10 Billion Federal Contract Award to Microsoft
data.text: The inevitable protest by Amazon.com Inc. (NASDAQ: AMZN) of the U.S. Department of Defense’s decision to award a $10 billion cloud services contract to Microsoft Corp. (NASDAQ: MSFT) is coming soon to the U.S. Court of Federal Claims.

data.title: Amazon will fight the awarding of the Pentagon’s $10 billion JEDI contract to Microsoft
data.text: The Joint Enterprise Defense Infrastructure project is one of the initiatives the U.S. Government is taking to modernize its critical computer infrastructure.

data.title: Amazon challenges Pentagon's $10 billion cloud computing contract known as Jedi
data.text: Amazon is challenging the Defense Department over a major contract that went to Microsoft.

data.title: US defense chief says cloud contract was fair, despite Amazon challenge
data.text: U.S. Defense Secretary Mark Esper said on Friday the Pentagon  awarded Microsoft Corp  an up to $10 billion cloud computing contract after a fair competition, after Amazon.com Inc  announced plans to challenge it over alleged bias.
